body: "I wonder if people are somehow lulling themselves into a belief that the digital world is not real or somehow divorced from the real world": Grasshopper Eyes The Potomac says everything is connected.
original_body: "I wonder if people are somehow lulling themselves into a belief that the digital world is not real or somehow divorced from the real world": Grasshopper Eyes The Potomac says everything is connected.
title: Jamaica, U.S.A.: Virtual Reality
